original_text: At that time, the Lord will shake the tree! He will do that to his people everywhere from the River Euphrates to the Stream of Egypt. Then he will bring together all of you, one by one, you Israelite people.
korean_text: 너희 이스라엘 자손들아 그 날에 여호와께서 창일하는 하수에서부터 애굽 시내에까지 과실을 떠는 것 같이 너희를 하나하나 모으시리라

sentences.original_text: the Lord will shake the tree!
He will do that to his people
sentences.korean_translation: 주께서 그의 백성에게 그렇게 하실 것이다

sentences.original_text: Then he will bring together all of you
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 그는 너희 모두를 모으실 것이다
